parameters.name: ConfigId
parameters.description: The configuration ID, You can call the [ListVideoProcessings](~~ListVideoProcessings~~) operation to obtain the ID.

parameters.name: ConfigType
parameters.description:
The configuration type. Use this parameter to query global configurations or feature configurations. This parameter takes effect only if the functionName parameter is passed.

Valid values:

*   global
*   rule

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Maximum value: 500. Default value: 500.

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: The rule name. This parameter takes effect only when parameter functionName is specified.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The website ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) operation.

parameters.name: SiteVersion
parameters.description: The version number of the website configurations. You can use this parameter to specify a version of your website to apply the feature settings. By default, version 0 is used.
